Base class for Font generators.

Base class for Font generators.
AbstractWordToImage - class com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy.wordtoimage.AbstractWordToImage.
Implementation skeletton for the WordToImage interface Basically this class implements the imageFromWord method proceding as folow : Checks the word lenght Creates an java.text.AttributedString from the word Apply font to the AttributedString using the abstract method getFont Create an image for the background using the abstact method getBackround Put the text on the backround using the abstact method pasteText Return the newly created image This class implements the Template method pattern from the GOF design patterns.
AbstractWordToImage() - Constructor for class com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy.wordtoimage.AbstractWordToImage

com.octo.captcha - package com.octo.captcha

com.octo.captcha.image - package com.octo.captcha.image
Package for implementations of Pix Captchas : Captcha with pics chalenges.
com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy - package com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy
This package a struture for implementing gimpys
A gimpy is PixCaptcha with the question "Spell the word".

ComposeDictionaryWordGenerator - class com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy.wordgenerator.ComposeDictionaryWordGenerator.
This Word Generator use a Dictionnary to compose new Words from existing words.
ComposeDictionaryWordGenerator(DictionaryReader) - Constructor for class com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy.wordgenerator.ComposeDictionaryWordGenerator
 
ComposedWordToImage - class com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy.wordtoimage.ComposedWordToImage.
Base class for composed WordToImage It extends the AbstractWord to image and uses three abstract subclasses : a AbstractFontGenerator to implement the getFont() method a AbstractBackgroundGenerator to implement the getBackround() method a AbstractTextParser to implement the pasteText() method By this design people can implement separatly different parts of the algorithm.
ComposedWordToImage(FontGenerator, BackgroundGenerator, TextPaster) - Constructor for class com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy.wordtoimage.ComposedWordToImage
